column11: Review Text

We popped in to get a few things, having travelled Sri Lanka, we found the supermarket to be expensive and quite small. The actual ahopping centre had about 4 stores upstairs, mainly electrical. Not very interesting for tourists. More suitable for locals.
The best shopping / entertainment complex in Jaffna with multiplex cinemas, food court, retail and one of the largest outlets of cargills Supermarket chain.

I actually visited on 2019  from Toronto to get some local chocolates for my family and i got surprised to see this store was well organized and clean.  Also the staffs were very friendly and helped me in all the way to find my needs.  I recommend this store any time and i did see the prices were very affordable.  Good to see a building like this in my native place.  Thank you all for keeping this place clean and smily faces from all associates. .

column8: Small, 3-story shopping mall,great location, limited parking: groceries & fast fall court
column11: Very convenient, good selection, moderate prices, good service, clean, nice atmosphere except food court is noisy with small children running rampart and several food shops are vacant or closed.

We first went here in search of the advertised food hall however, there is only KFC still operating now.. There are a handful of shops on the second floor, a movie theatre on the fourth floor and a very large supermarket on the bottom floor.
This is a very good Mall here.Few shops here.The super market is the biggest here in Jaffna.The counter service slow at the Cargills super market.

column8: Small modern shopping mall with supermarket and cinema
column11: This shopping mall was located next door to our hotel, Jetsing Jaffna, and has a pretty big supermarket on the lower floor, a small number of clean bright shops on the  next floor, including clothing, sari and male clothing, quite a lot of electrical stores and upstairs a small food court with the cinema. By most large city standards it is small, but very modern and handy if you are staying in the hotel. True, there are escalators up but the lift is accessible and there are a flight of stairs near the outside corner.

This is an average shopping mall. On the ground floor there is a supermarket and few different shops on the first floor. Going up to the first floor there in an escalator but coming down only lift. I couldn't find any stairs. As in some places in Sri Lanka there is a lift operator who occupies a space. During rush time it is a bit inconvenience

This Place Is A Gem Of A Mall In Jaffna, Their Are 4 Floors Which Can Be Accessed Via The Manned Lifts, The Mall Is AirConditioned With Parking Available. Amazed At How Clean This Place Was. Went Multiple Times During My Stay For The Cinema (4th Floor) & The Restaurants On The (3rd Floor). Must Visit On Your Travels
We went there 2 weeks ago.Ground floor is supermarket.1st floor some restaurents and 2nd floor movie theater.(Tamil Movies)Its an airconditioned complex.

Very small shopping mall with a supermarket, few other shops, small food court (KFC) and a cinema. The saddest thing about this mall was the poor security guys that have to stay in the lift pressing buttons all day
amazing! you name it they have it! you will be surprised to note tha this super market has everything you need, wonderful outlet with sufficient stocks,
We went there for the first time there.the staffs and very friendly,and the price for cinema is responsible and the seat and movie quality is very good
happy to see these kinds of places in Jaffna as well. KFC, RIO all are there. cleanliness is really good. happy of sri lanka

A multi storey fully A/C building with Cargills supermarket on the ground floor, shops (phone, fashion, lingerie, souvenirs) and restaurants (KFC, Rio) on the second floor and a 3D cinema on the third. Is this the start of the development of Jaffna?? Possibly...Cargills is a good place to get gifts for loved ones back home or food to keep you going during your time in Jaffna.
It's situated right in the middle of the city and is a ok place. Very upmarket. Didn't spend much time there...
After the heat of Jaffna this is a nice place to stop off for a drink or a snack. There's a KFC and place selling really good fancy cakes also a Pizza place that was never open when I was there.

Went to a food city in Colombo which was great as it's easy to just shop in one store and was happy to find that Jaffna had one. But the employees are extremely rude. They stare and don't help with anything. When purchasing they never have money in their tills so it's hard to receive change from them. Been twice and two different ladies were extremely rude and have the worst behaviour. We complained to the manager who was nice and apologetic but the staff need retraining in dealing with foreign customers as we all want a pleasant time

Happy to see Jaffna having a Cargills food city. Extremely friendly and very helpful staff. Agree with some of the other reviewers about the quality of the vegetables and fruit. Bought some wood apples and they all had go in the bin! Come on Jaffna! You could do better! Never compromise on quality!

This is most horrible place in Jaffna, only good think about this is the AC. In KFC went to get  drink it taste like water, complain to the manager he didn't open his mouth looked at one of the staff and they changed the drink with ice cubes, still taste like water went to get the money back they said no refund, so changed for water. The cinema looked so boring, the shop also boring and very expensive and the supermarket also very expensive. The building only for people coming form western countries. I came from Germany first time in Jaffna after 30 years. In my experience I love the food and service from the opposite coffe shop... I will advise anyone no to go ther just waist of time and Money.
Came for dinner with the family. Rio ice cream was good. All other shops closed after 7pm. Toilets were in deplorable condition. Will not recommend for family dinner.

I love Cargillscenter Shopping. The full building is AC. ðŸ˜Š ðŸ‘‰Groundfloor : -Cargills Food City - Supermarket - they hv awesome Sortiment. -Cargills Bank ðŸ‘‰ First Floor : Photoshop, electronic shop, mens wear shop, a.very small gens/ladys western style Cloth Shop, Optician, Beauty Parlour, Fancy Shop ðŸ‘‰2nd Floor Food Court - KFC , Rio Ice Cream, Pizza.... ðŸ‘‰3rd Floor 3 Cinema Theater with AC. Just Awesome sounding and Screen Quality. Just 1 Minus point beacause of the Toilets. Tht was not clean. Its better they charge some Rupees and keep it clean.
Cargills square is one of the Up markets shop constructed in Jaffna recently. This is situated very close to Jaffna General Hospital. Convenient location.

Visited a week after it opened on Christmas Day. The lower floor only has a Cargills Food City and Cargills Bank outlet. Second floor has some electronics plus standard mall shops, maybe 10 -15 shops. Third floor has a cinema I think. Fairly small mall all in all.

The mall itself is very small with not many stores. There a food court with Kfc and a pizza place but you should definitily go to there for the cinema. The movies are in Tamil but they have english subtitles.

It was wonderful coming to this place as the Cargills  supermarket has everything one needs & its not necessary to carry everything from else where. A great help to travellers as everything is available  in this building, visited it many times for our requirements.

Located near to the jaffna hospital !!!! available various types of shops and cargills super market to fulfill any type of needs!!!! Three film halls availabe maintain by ceylon theaters....one of them is a 3D too...

Carghills Square is of the few small western-style shopping centres in Jaffna Town, and a bit of a haven for the disoriented and overstimulated overseas traveller.  Its main attractions would include air conditioning, underground parking, a well-stocked supermarket on the ground floor with friendly helpful staff including some English-speaking, and various other stores with western-style goods located upstairs. It's more comfortable to shop than the town itself, but not as much fun - Jaffna Town itself is crowded, chaotic, frantic with vehicles bikes and people everywhere; it is full of colour and life, interesting and there are bargains everywhere.

This is my first visit to Jaffna, after 30 years of war torn city now becoming developed. I was so happy to see a Mall which include three theatres, Restaurants and shopping. It give a great look to the city, cargills had done a great job.
